LanguageData.RimTalk_UseNewTagMatchingDesc: When enabled, knowledge will only be matched by tags, not by content keywords. This is a simple and direct matching method that gives users full control.
LanguageData.RimTalk_EnableKnowledgeChainingDesc: When enabled, matched knowledge can trigger additional knowledge matches.
LanguageData.RimTalk_CanBeExtractedEnabled: Can be extracted for knowledge chaining (Click to disable)
LanguageData.RimTalk_CanBeExtractedDisabled: Cannot be extracted for knowledge chaining (Click to enable)
LanguageData.RimTalk_CanBeMatchedEnabled: Can be matched by keywords (Click to disable)
LanguageData.RimTalk_CanBeMatchedDisabled: Cannot be matched by keywords (Click to enable)
